GnuTLS NEWS -- History of user-visible changes. -*- outline -*- GnuTLS NEWS -- History of user-visible changes. -*- outline -*-

* Version 3.4.5 (released 2015-09-12)
** libgnutls: When re-importing CRLs to a trust list ensure that there
no duplicate entries.
** certtool: Removed any arbitrary limits imposed on input file sizes
and maximum number of certificates imported.
** certtool: Allow specifying fixed dates on CRL generation.
** gnutls-cli-debug: Added check for inappropriate fallback support
(RFC7507).
** API and ABI modifications:
No changes since last version.
* Version 3.4.4 (released 2015-08-10) * Version 3.4.4 (released 2015-08-10)
** libgnutls: added high level API (gnutls_prf_rfc5705) to access ** libgnutls: added high level API (gnutls_prf_rfc5705) to access
the PRF as specified by RFC5705. Suggestion and original patch the PRF as specified by RFC5705. Suggestion and original patch
by Rick van Rein. by Rick van Rein.
** libgnutls: Link to trousers (TPM library) dynamically when this ** libgnutls: Link to trousers (TPM library) dynamically when this
functionality is requested. functionality is requested.
** libgnutls: Fix issue with server side sending the status request ** libgnutls: Fix issue with server side sending the status request
 End of changes. 1 change blocks.
